verses.roman:
saba śrotā-gaṇera kari caraṇa vandana
yāṅ-sabāra caraṇa-kṛpā--śubhera kāraṇa

synonyms: saba—all; śrotā-gaṇera—of the readers; kari—I do; caraṇa vandana—worshiping the lotus feet; yāṅ-sabāra—of all of whom; caraṇa-kṛpā—the mercy of the lotus feet; śubhera kāraṇa—the cause of all good fortune.
translation: I now worship the lotus feet of all my readers, for by the mercy of their lotus feet there is all good fortune.
